title.rendered: Koovs Strategic Investment from Future Group

content.rendered: Alvarium Merchant Banking (formerly Lepe Partners) advises Koovs on its strategic investment from Future Group.

excerpt.rendered: Alvarium Merchant Banking (formerly Lepe Partners) advises Koovs on its strategic investment from Future Group.
